ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Why did you start a Bard?
ygData.msgSnippet: Let s be nice.  When we all started a bard, most of us weren t quite as sarcastic.  For me, my bard was my second character ever. I started because the variety
ygData.messageBody:
Let's be nice. When we all started a bard, most of us weren't quite as
sarcastic. For me, my bard was my second character ever.

I started because the variety of things a bard could supposedly do with
their songs. I liked the fact we got Selos at level 5(my first character
was a shaman and sow was very nice to have). I liked it that we could wear
armor and melee(naive wasn't I?). And the challenge that twisting
represented(and the sore fingers - hehe), always doing something, intrigued
me.

I know we all love our bards. And that makes it so frustrating when it
seems others don't care. Well, anyway, my thoughts and memories...

Piemur

-----Original Message-----
From: Stephane Lange [mailto:slange@...]
Sent: Wednesday, January 10, 2001 10:53 AM

Perhaps nothing more than a blue mana battery ;)

I have always dreamed to spend 45 days of my life play a battery,
what a great feeling.
I will never look the battery of my car with the same eyes.

-----Message d'origine-----
De : Cyr, Thierry [mailto:thierry.cyr@...]
Envoye : mercredi 10 janvier 2001 16:30
A : 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Objet : RE: [eqbards] Why did you start a Bard?


I was under the assumption that i was a tank that could heal and also run
fast as hell, but now i'm nothing more than a broken class 8(

Minkin

Newbie #1 "hey what was that we passed awhile ago?"
Newbie #2 "I think it was a bard..."

-----Original Message-----
From: Khelan [mailto:khelan@...]
Sent: January 10, 2001 9:05 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] Why did you start a Bard?


I've always wondered why other Bards started playing the Bardic class. When
I first learned of the game, a friend mentioned that Bards could always find
their corpses (and the zones were huge when I first saw the game), and could
run faster then others...that got me to start playing the Bard, and I've
been hooked ever since. (It also helped that the Bard class is so flexible
once you learn it...that's a huge bonus.)

So, why did you start playing a Bard?


--Khelan, crying over his loss of speed
